metadata.title: CVE-2021-0561 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In append_to_verify_fifo_interleaved_ of stream_encoder.c, there is apossible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could leadto local information disclosure with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android-11Android ID: A-174302683

criterions.comment: flac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
